text: Wash It All Away may refer to: *Wash It All Away (song), a song from Five Finger Death Punch's sixth studio album Got Your Six *Wash It All Away, a song from Jesu's compilation album Pale Sketches *Wash It All Away, a song from Colin Hay's fifth solo album Transcendental Highway *Wash It All Away, a song from Royal Bliss' debut album Life In-Between
title: Wash It All Away
